name: pouchdb-adapter-crackup
description: An encrypted leveldown adapter for PouchDB.

scripts.test:deps: dependency-check --unused -i mocha -i standard -i dependency-check -i npm-run-all -i nyc -i coveralls index.js test.js
scripts.coveralls: npm run cov && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > lcov.info

author: Diana Thayer <garbados@gmail.com>
